org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.wsdl
Class AeResourceResolver

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.wsdl.AeResourceResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeResourceResolver
public class AeResourceResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeResourceResolver

Contains a map of location hints to actual mappings for resources deployed in a bpr (used during deployment validation).

Field Summary
private  java.util.Map mMap
          Location hint key to catalog mapping resource location resolution.

addEntries

public void addEntries(IAeCatalogMapping[] aMappings,
                       boolean aOverwriteFlag)
Add an array of entries into the resolver.

Parameters:
aMappings -
aOverwriteFlag - If true, then previous entries mapped to the same location hint will be replaced.

                        boolean aOverwriteFlag)
Add an entry into the resolver.

Parameters:
aMapping - The mapping to add.
aOverwriteFlag - If true, then the previous entry mapped to the same location hint will be replaced.
